mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from membership where memId=#{memId}
select memnum,memname,memid,mempwd,memphone,birth,email,grade,to_char(memregdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') memregdate from membership where memid=#{memId} and mempwd=#{memPwd}
mapper.update: update membership SET memPhone=#{memPhone},email=#{email} where memId=#{memId}
update membership set memPwd=#{memPwd} where memId=#{memId}
update membership set grade='탈퇴' where memId=#{memId}
